Rant War

 02 Jan 2008

Zed Shaw (Mongrel creator, amongst other awesome things) had a small rant about Rails and how he's been fucked over in the world, aka Rails is a Ghetto.

Compared to my last rant, Zed is a ranting king. He makes it sound so convincing, but most of the article is about behind-the-scenes politics.

Made for an interesting read.
